ibis.ipl.examples

Class RegistryUpcalls

  • java.lang.Object
    • ibis.ipl.examples.RegistryUpcalls
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ibis.ipl.RegistryEventHandler

    public class RegistryUpcalls
extends java.lang.Object
implements ibis.ipl.RegistryEventHandler
    This program shows how to handle events from the registry using upcalls. It will run for 30 seconds, then stop. You can start as many instances of this application as you like.
